{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

A protocol is a list of Circuits together with syndrome maps corresponding to each circuit by which we decide how which circuit to execute next. The protocol must also define termination conditions and a means to decide if a logical failure occured or not.

{% raw %} 
class Protocol:
    
    def __init__(self, circuits, syndromes):
        pass
{% endraw %}
